children.name: Aroma
children.description: Aroma testing is a sensory exploration designed to identify and classify the different odors perceived in a sample, such as food, beverages or fragrances. This analysis focuses on recognizing top notes, subcategories and specific attributes that make up the aroma profile, helping to improve sensory appreciation and product characterization.

children.name: Vegetal
children.description: Fresh, green and herbal aromas that evoke the scent of living vegetation, freshly cut leaves or even fresh vegetables. These scents convey a sense of naturalness and freshness.

children.name: Grassy
children.description: Aromas reminiscent of fresh grass fields, wild vegetation or herbaceous plants. It is a fresh olfactory profile, sometimes with a wet touch, that connects with nature.

children.name: Grassy
children.description: A fresh, green, damp scent reminiscent of freshly cut grass or dewy morning blades of grass. It is light and revitalizing, with a natural and lively character.

children.name: Mesona
children.description: A deep herbal and earthy aroma, characteristic of the Mesona plant (Mesona chinensis), also known as “jelly herb”. It has an herbal, slightly sweet profile with a woody or earthy touch that evokes a traditional and medicinal character.

children.name: Beans
children.description: Aromas reminiscent of legumes such as beans, with warm, earthy and slightly sweet notes. This aromatic profile is comforting and evokes natural and traditional ingredients used in beverages, desserts and savory dishes.

children.name: Mung bean
children.description: A mild, sweet and creamy aroma reminiscent of cooked mung beans or desserts made with this legume. It has an earthy undertone and a delicate character that makes it very popular in Asian sweets and beverages such as milk tea desserts.

children.name: Soybean
children.description: A more robust and earthy aroma, reminiscent of cooked soybeans, soy milk or even fresh tofu. Its olfactory profile is warm, sometimes slightly toasted, with a touch of natural sweetness.

children.name: Vegetables
children.description: Fresh, green and earthy aromas that evoke the essence of common vegetables.

children.name: Baby Corn
children.description: A soft, sweet and vegetal aroma reminiscent of the tenderness of fresh baby corn. It has a delicate profile, with notes of light sweetness and a vegetal undertone that evokes freshness and youth.

children.name: Mushroom
children.description: An earthy, umami and slightly dry aroma that evokes the richness and depth of fresh or dried mushrooms. This aromatic profile is warm and robust, adding a sense of connection to the earth.

children.name: Cucumber
children.description: Watery and fresh, ideal for light blends.

children.name: Herbs
children.description: Natural and comforting aromas that evoke plants used for relaxation or stimulation.

children.name: Chachomile
children.description: Soft and floral, with a sweet and warm character.

children.name: Mint
children.description: Fresh and vibrant, with a mentholated and stimulating profile.

children.name: Flowery
children.description: Floral aromas that range from delicate and light notes to intense and intoxicating profiles. These fragrances evoke freshness, femininity, and elegance, with a wide variety of flowers that symbolize different levels of intensity and olfactory complexity.

children.name: Light
children.description: Delicate and soft aromas reminiscent of ethereal flowers, with a fresh and slightly sweet profile. These notes are perceived as elegant, refined and calm, ideal to evoke serenity and lightness.

children.name: Orchid
children.description: A soft and slightly sweet scent that evokes exoticism and elegance. Orchid has a delicate floral profile with a fresh and natural undertone.

children.name: Magnolia
children.description: A creamy and fresh scent with a clean floral touch. Evokes the purity and softness of magnolia petals.

children.name: Osmanthus
children.description: A sweet and fruity fragrance with apricot nuances. It offers a unique floral profile, light but enveloping.

children.name: Jasmine
children.description: An iconic floral scent, sweet and relaxing, evoking sensuality and freshness. Its profile is classic and very versatile.

children.name: Logan blossom
children.description: A subtle, sweet scent with an herbal touch. Longan flower has a light and exotic profile.

children.name: Strong
children.description: Robust, intense and deeply enveloping floral aromas. These fragrances are more complex, with a vibrant character and a striking presence.

children.name: Gardenia
children.description: A sweet, creamy and intoxicating scent that evokes sophistication. Gardenia is known for its powerful and rich floral profile.

children.name: White ginger lily
children.description: A floral and spicy aroma, with fresh and warm nuances at the same time. It is exotic and captivating, with a distinctive character.

children.name: Rose
children.description: Deep, rich and classic floral scent. It is a fragrance that evokes sophistication, romance and elegance.

children.name: Betel blossom
children.description: An intense fragrance with spicy and earthy nuances. Betel flower has an intriguing and distinctive aroma.

children.name: Orange blossom
children.description: It is a delicate, sweet and citrusy aroma that comes from orange blossoms. It is highly appreciated in perfumery, aromatic teas and food because of its fresh, light and at the same time sophisticated character. This scent evokes images of sunny gardens and Mediterranean landscapes.

children.name: Pomelo blossom
children.description: A vibrant and fresh scent with a citrus touch. Its strong floral profile has a refreshing and fruity undertone.

children.name: Sweet
children.description: Aromas related to different types of sweetness, evoking tastes and smells that are pleasant, comforting and highly palatable.

children.name: Sugary
children.description: Aromas related to different types of sweetness, evoking tastes and smells that are pleasant, comforting and highly palatable. These subcategories represent variations in the type of sweetness, from simple to complex.

children.name: Sugar
children.description: Simple and pure aroma, similar to refined or powdered sugar.It is a clean sweetness, light, and almost “neutral” in terms of complexity.

children.name: Brown sugar
children.description: An intense and rich aroma arising from the caramelization of the sugar. It is more toasty and has notes of nuts, butter and burnt sweetness.

children.name: Caramel
children.description: An intense and rich aroma arising from the caramelization of the sugar. It is more toasty and has notes of nuts, butter and burnt sweetness.

children.name: Candied melon
children.description: A fresh and fruity aroma that combines the sweetness of melon with a touch of crystallized sugar. It is light, refreshing and exotic.

children.name: Milky
children.description: Represents aromas related to dairy products. There aromas smooth, creamy and comforting, with a very specific character that can evoke warmth and contentment.

children.name: Butter
children.description: A rich, fatty, warm aroma that evokes melted butter or freshly made toast. It is has robust and satisfacying character.

children.name: Milk
children.description: A smooth, fresh and creamy aroma reminiscent of freshly poured milk. It is more delicate than butter, but equally peasant.

children.name: Honey
children.description: It is related to the natural sweetness that comes from honey

children.name: Honey
children.description: A sweet and floral scent with warm touches. Often has notes of beeswax and flowers, making it rich and multifaceted.

children.name: Beauty tea
children.description: A more sophisticated and softer variant of the honey scent, often blended with herbal or floral notes. It is has a light, fresh character that evokes elegance.

children.name: Fruity
children.description: These scents bring freshness, sweetness and vitality, and are highly versatile.The fruity notes are usually light, vibrant and pleasant, providing a sense of naturalness.

children.name: Fresh
children.description: It represents fruits in their most natural and vibrant state.

children.name: Pear
children.description: A sweet and delicate aroma, with a watery touch that makes it refreshing and light.

children.name: Guava
children.description: Tropical and distinctive, it combines sweetness with a unique acidic nuance.

children.name: Green apple
children.description: Refreshing and acidic, with a crisp character that evokes youth and energy.

children.name: Lemon
children.description: Citrus, bright and acidic, a classic symbol of freshness.

children.name: Ripe
children.description: They come from fruits at their peak of ripeness, offering sweet and richer profiles. These notes are warm, soft and evoke a sense of abundance.

children.name: Peach
children.description: Soft and floral, with a juicy sweetness that is seductive.

children.name: Mango
children.description: Exotic and tropical, with an intense sweetness and a creamy touch.

children.name: Lychee
children.description: A combination of sweetness and floral notes that are fresh and unique.

children.name: Orange
children.description: Citrusy, juicy and warm, with a balance between sweetness and acidity.

children.name: Pineapple
children.description: Tropical and refreshing, with a vibrant profile that blends sweetness and acidity.

children.name: Bergamot
children.description: A sophisticated floral citrus fruit, known for its use in fragrances and teas.

children.name: Melon
children.description: Sweet and watery, it provides a light and refreshing sensation.

children.name: Banana
children.description: Soft and creamy, with a warm sweetness that evokes comfort.

children.name: Plum
children.description: Sweet with a touch of acid, perfect for complex aromatic profiles.

children.name: Dried
children.description: Aromas of fruits that have been dried, which intensifies their sweetness and gives them a deeper and warmer character. These notes are ideal for creating more complex and robust aromatic profiles.

children.name: Dried longan
children.description: Sweet and woody, with warm nuances reminiscent of honey.

children.name: Dried plum
children.description: A balance between sweetness and acidity, with depth and caramelized nuances.

children.name: Roasted
children.description: It focuses on aromas associated with foods and materials that have been cooked or heated to release rich, warm and complex notes. These aromas evoke warmth, depth and often have an earthy or smoky touch.

children.name: Nuts Grains
children.description: It includes notes of nuts and toasted grains that offer a combination of sweetness, earthiness and richness.

children.name: Peanut
children.description: Warm and oily aroma, with a mild sweetness and a slightly salty character.

children.name: Sweet potato
children.description: Sweet and earthy, with a comforting, slightly caramelized profile.

children.name: Rice
children.description: Subtle and toasty, evoking warmth and simplicity.

children.name: Hazelnut
children.description: Sweet, rich and creamy, with a toasted and smooth touch.

children.name: Backed
children.description: Aromas that evoke carefully baked and crafted products, with a sweet and warm touch.

children.name: Brown rice
children.description: Deep and earthy, with a soft toasty sweetness.

children.name: Cookie
children.description: Sweet and buttery, with notes of caramelized sugar.

children.name: Roasted barley
children.description: Warm and malty, with a touch of roasted bitterness.

children.name: Chocolate
children.description: Rich and sweet, with a dark and slightly bitter profile.

children.name: Coffe
children.description: Intense and aromatic, with a mix of bitterness and complex sweetness.

children.name: Roasted chetsnut
children.description: Sweet, with a warm, earthy and comforting aroma.

children.name: Smoked
children.description: Aromas that evoke products cooked by fire or exposed to smoke, offering a strong and robust profile.

children.name: Smoke plum
children.description: Sweet and smoky, with a balance between fruit and charcoal character.

children.name: Charcoal
children.description: Intense and deep, with a dry and smoky aroma that evokes fire and burnt wood.

children.name: Special
children.description: It groups unique and distinctive aromas that do not easily fit into common categories. These scents are characterized by their uniqueness and their ability to evoke specific places, landscapes or rare sensory experiences.

children.name: Earthy
children.description: It focuses on notes associated with earth, plants and wood, evoking a connection with nature.

children.name: Tabacco
children.description: A deep, warm and complex aroma with sweet and woody notes, often associated with sophistication.

children.name: Pine
children.description: Fresh, resinous and invigorating, evoking dense forests and clean air.

children.name: Woody
children.description: Rich, earthy and robust, with hints of dry or freshly cut wood.

children.name: Marine
children.description: It includes fresh and salty notes that evoke the sea breeze and the coastal environment.

children.name: Seawwed
children.description: A salty and earthy aroma with vegetal nuances, evoking beaches and salty waters.

children.name: Sea fish
children.description: A fresh and penetrating aroma with a characteristic profile of seafood and salt water.

children.name: Taste
children.description: Taste testing is a sensory evaluation focused on identifying and classifying the flavors present in a sample, such as food or beverages. During this test, characteristics such as sweetness, acidity, bitterness, saltiness and umami are analyzed, as well as their combinations and persistence on the palate, with the objective of understanding and describing the taste profile of the product.

children.name: Basic
children.description: The basic taste evaluation focuses on identifying the five fundamental tastes: sweet, salty, sour, bitter and umami. This test analyzes the intensity, balance and presence of these flavors in the sample, providing key information about their taste profile and their impact on the palate.

children.name: Sourness
children.description: Sour taste is related to foods such as lemon, vinegar or yogurt. It is perceived when acids, such as citric acid or acetic acid, are present.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Saltiness
children.description: This flavor is perceived when salts are present, mainly sodium chloride (table salt). It is essential to improve the overall flavor of food.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Sweetness
children.description: Sweetness is perceived when sugars or sweeteners are present. It is a pleasant taste that is usually associated with desserts and comfort foods.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Bitterness
children.description: This flavor is related to compounds such as caffeine or tannins. Although sometimes considered unpleasant, it is appreciated in foods such as coffee and bitter chocolate.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Umami
children.description: This flavor, known as “savory” or “delicious”, is associated with foods rich in monosodium glutamate or free amino acids. It is common in protein or fermented foods.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.

children.name: Mouthfeel
children.description: Mouthfeel evaluation analyzes the physical properties of the sample, such as texture, viscosity, astringency, creaminess, and effervescence. This analysis complements the perception of flavor by considering how the product feels on the palate, which influences the overall sensory experience.
The flavor is barely perceptible.
The flavor is light and does not dominate the overall profile.
The flavor is clearly identifiable but balanced with other flavors.
The flavor begins to stand out from the others and is predominant.
The flavor is extremely strong and completely dominates the flavor profile.
